meanings.sent1: She always chooses antiobscenity movies to watch with her family.
meanings.sent2: The antiobscenity campaign aims to promote clean and family-friendly content.
meanings.sent3: The antiobscenity advocate wore a t-shirt with a funny slogan against inappropriate content.
meanings.sent4: Her antiobscenity stance was like a bright light in a dark room of indecency.
meanings.sent5: The antiobscenity policy made sure all public displays were suitable for all ages.

meanings.definition: A person or group that opposes obscenity.
meanings.sent1: The antiobscenity spoke passionately at the town hall meeting about the need for decency in media.
meanings.sent2: The antiobscenity group organized a protest against explicit content in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The antiobscenity club had a humorous mascot to represent their cause.
meanings.sent4: She was a warrior for antiobscenity, fighting against inappropriate material with words of truth.
meanings.sent5: The antiobscenity organization worked tirelessly to keep the community free from offensive material.

meanings.definition: A law or regulation that prohibits obscenity.
meanings.sent1: The antiobscenity was passed unanimously by the city council.
meanings.sent2: The antiobscenity faced legal challenges but ultimately stood firm.
meanings.sent3: The antiobscenity decree was enforced with a touch of humor by the local authorities.
meanings.sent4: The antiobscenity law acted as a shield against inappropriate content in public spaces.
meanings.sent5: The antiobscenity regulation ensured that all public displays met the community standards.
